DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to determine the prevalence and severity of alopecia (hair loss) experienced by postmenopausal breast cancer patients receiving endocrine therapy including Tamoxifen, Letrozole (Femara), Exemestane (Aromasin), or Anastrozole (Arimidex).
DOC.brief_title: Alopecia Secondary to Endocrine Therapy in Postmenopausal Women With Breast Cancer
